abstract: Ed comparing Tannenberg battle and battle in USSR-Finnish war
snippet: THIS is something which had better be said while the saying is good, because the fat is pretty close to the fire and already it has begun to bubble and spit. Maybe, before we realize, it will be too late to approach it comfortably....

headline.main: PROCEED WITH CARE; A Sober Discourse Upon the Subject of Pictures About the War

lead_paragraph: THIS is something which had better be said while the saying is good, because the fat is pretty close to the fire and already it has begun to bubble and spit. Maybe, before we realize, it will be too late to approach it comfortably.
